featured.text: Moran’s watercolors—the first color renderings of the area—as well as Jackson’s photos and the survey results were presented to the Congress.
His powerful images of Yellowstone fired the imagination of Congress members.

definition.zh_def: 國會；立法機構，通常由兩院組成。
definition.en_def: A formal assembly or meeting of representatives, especially for the purpose of making laws.
definition.example: The congress will vote on the new healthcare bill next week.
